A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I honestly think that "The Last Jedi" is the BEST Star Wars film I've saw! The scenes I mostly enjoyed was Rey and Kylo Ren's Force Bond scene\, and the time when they temporarily worked together\, destroying all of the Elite Guards. And about Rose Tico? I don't mind about her at all. Rose and Finn's subplot was a bit confusing\, but okay. I would recommend watching the movie\, since it's SO emotional!

And for those hater who dislike the "The Last Jedi"\, SHAME ON YOU.

Overall: 10/10.
